import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import Header from "./../components/Header"; import Rating from "../components/homeComponents/Rating"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import Message from "./../components/LoadingError/Error"; import {useDispatch, useSelector} from "react-redux"; import { listProductDetails} from "../Redux/Actions/ProductActions" const SingleProduct = ({ match }) => { const productId = match.params.id; const dispatch = useDispatch(); const productDetails = useSelector((state) => state.productDetails) const { loading, error, product } = useEffect(() => { dispatch(listProductDetails(productId)); }, [dispatch, productId]); return ( <>
{product.name}

{product.description}

Price
${product.price}
Status
{product.countInStock > 0 ? ( In Stock ) : ( unavailable )}
Reviews
{product.countInStock > 0 ? ( <>
Quantity
) : null}
{/* RATING */}
REVIEWS
No Reviews
Admin Doe Jan 12 2021

Comment
Please{" "} " Login " {" "} to write a review{" "}
); }; export default SingleProduct;
